website_summaries.verdict: Designed for industrial use, this mop bucket is efficient and hardy with a 35-quart capacity.
pros: Measurement marks help user gauge water level and use
cons: It's a lesser-known product, though the manufacturer stands behind it with a guarantee

customer_reviews.title: If you’re a contractor, think twice before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mop bucket for my business. If you’d like to really squeeze the water out, good luck! When you use the handle the back of the bucket itself folds inward. Meaning it’s not very strong. Very flexible. The back of the bucket doesn’t have the strength that it should like a Rubbermaid. For someone to squeeze most of the water out of the mop could result in injury if not paying attention to the back of the bucket folding in. The only decent quality is the wheels but I have a feeling they will end up not lasting to long. cheap version. So if you’re a contractor, just get the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Heinecan

customer_reviews.title: Don't ever buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the most horrible product I have ever buy. The wheels keep falling off, all the screws are loose, I have tighten the screws like 15 times and the keep falling off. I recommend to buy a Rubbermaid instead of this piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! You can't be the old tried and true technology. An old fashioned swab and a sturdy mop bucket and wringer, just like we used in the Barracks at Camp Pendleton back in the 1960's...
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Cripe

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this much cheaper alternative. I purchased to use to mop the floor at church and it’s perfect! The wheels glide so easily on the floor and it transitions from one room to another easily. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a durable, easy to manipulate, mop bucket!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Like because it is easy to use. Very well made. I like the rolling casters and being able to remove the wringer basket to empty bucket
customer_reviews.author: prettyiz

customer_reviews.title: Anyway need strength in arms
customer_reviews.text: I am old and my hands hurts them I get it to clean house and is so good and I can make mop dry so good. I love it. So professional
customer_reviews.author: RBlaya

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My house is all wood floors and tiles. Best gift I ever bought myself. Works great and saves my manicure & back.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Edwards

customer_reviews.title: One of my best buys for the home.
customer_reviews.text: This was a no Brainerd for me. I have a Lanai that gets dust, cat hair and spots from rain when we have those Florida storms and a bucket such as the one I purchased helps me maintain a clean floor. I liken it to swabbing the deck lol. The bucket Maneuvers easily over door stops all of the floors and all of the areas I need to roll it with ease. They actually use simular ones at the school district where I work. By far a great bargain for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Brown

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy  /  cheap
customer_reviews.text: I never write a bad review. Unfortunately this one deserves it working as a custodian/janitor for over 40 years. This is the worst mop bucket/ringer I’ve ever come across. The ringer is small and has no place to hold the mop handle. So it falls to the floor or you have to lean it against a wall. The part of theMop bucket that holds the ringer is very flimsy. Don’t waste your money. This is the first time I wrote a bad review only because it deserves it.
customer_reviews.author: vernon

customer_reviews.title: Looks alittle flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried it out yet, currently have the Rubbermaid one and this product feels alittle flimsy compare to my current one.
customer_reviews.author: ESK8 NYC

customer_reviews.title: only a tiny bit damaged but works great! its awsome!
customer_reviews.text: im giving it a 4 star only bcuz it was a tiny bit damaged . other than that it works great love the wheels they are soft n easy to push and move around. its awsome i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Decent value, compared to the rubbermaid mop bucket.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good commercial style mop bucket for residential use. Be warned this is not a rubbermaid quality mop bucket/wringer. But also know this product does not come with a rubbermaid price tag either. I bought this to mop up water getting into my basement, I serves it's purpose well. I don't try to squeeze the wringer with the force of a gorilla either. It seems like if you don't use excessive force on the wringer making the bucket deform, this bucket will last.
customer_reviews.author: The Tile Guy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to easily mop my floors!
customer_reviews.text: I had a regular cotton mop and smaller mop bucket with a sort of wringer (press down the mop and it sort of drains it). I got a bigger mop that wouldn’t lose strings every time I used it. The first time I tried to use my old mop bucket, the “so called wringer” broke. I said that’s it, I’m getting a proper mop bucket!!! Price here was awesome. Now I can mop and wring my new mop so easily!!! I rolls and maneuvers so easy. Wrings out my big mop without problems. I rinse it out after each use. It is light enough for me to use and clean(I’m 61) but heavy duty enough to last!!!
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. It's a quality product and not flimsy. Glad I took a chance. Arrived quick and I got it at a great price. Would buy again if I ever needed another.
customer_reviews.author: carol swanson/Train Hard Win Big, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly engineered. Falls over unless really full.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is poorly engineered. The wheels near the mop wringer are too far under the bucket. When you ring the mop the bucket tends to fall over (unless the bucket is really full). I literally just chucked this thing out the back door after i mopped up a huge mess then it fell over. So I remopped a 2nd huge mess then it fell over again. Out the back door it went. Shame on this engineering.
customer_reviews.author: DaveB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described by the seller, it’s been several weeks of use in my restaurant and it’s holding up just great
customer_reviews.author: Conrad S.

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mob a good because it moves around my house very easily with the wheels on it and also it’s big enough that the water doesn’t get as dirty on my floors. I do highly recommend this book it for people in their homes.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Keeney

customer_reviews.title: It works with mops to clean floors ! :-)
customer_reviews.text: Thick walled construction, solid. Heavier than I expected, not a bad thing. Everything good, except could use larger, stronger, and softer wheels for smoother faster rolling - wheels included do work well and they do not mark up the floor. Best use is to carry it & park it in one spot then mop whole floor. I am very happy with my purchase, good value for the money, and it gets the job done ! Thank you! :-)
customer_reviews.author: SeaJay

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!,
customer_reviews.text: It would be great if I were a guy who lifts weights, not a 5.2 120 ob woman- who can barely move the wet Mop!! & the thing falls apart!!!
customer_reviews.author: dancingLass

customer_reviews.title: Not stable, tips over backwards
customer_reviews.text: This is very good except for one thing, it is NOT stable. The handle pivot point is too far forward and when you have water in the bucket and need to lift it over a threshold or anything else if you pick it up by the handle it will flip over backwards suddenly spilling the water. If you are like me it will take 2 or 3 spills to learn not to use the handle to pick the bucket up, which is a real PIA. Other than that the bucket works well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Handle came off the first time
customer_reviews.text: Broke literally the first day... the black part came out and I cannot reach them
customer_reviews.author: haluxy

customer_reviews.title: Very well-made
customer_reviews.text: This commercial grade combo is virtually indestructible. Have used it a couple of times and is very well-balanced and easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: Huggster

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use around my garage to soak up snow melt debris from my vehicles. Works great, and it was much cheaper than similar items at the big hardware stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B

customer_reviews.title: Cleans good helps house nice America #1
customer_reviews.text: This mop bucket is truly so much more than a simple AmazonBasics Side Press Wringer Combo 35-Quart, color Yellow... it is a wholehearted, capable, and awesome promise to the health, cleanliness, and overall well-being of your home and family. This mop bucket is able to handle the wettest water and the cleanest cleaner. The moppiest mops are wrung out in its Side Press Wringer with sheer effortlessness. Entire rooms’ floors are cleaned with the same amount of energy you’ve spent dreading the task. Get this bucket. It has wheels, which are basically the same as having pockets but for appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Jizzle McGizzle

customer_reviews.title: The bucket is solid--nuts keep falling off the handle and landing in poo.
customer_reviews.text: Total design fail on the handle. The acorn nuts keep falling off because they have no lock washers. The bucket likes granny poo that I have to mop up daily, but the acorn nuts on the handle fall off daily and I have to pick them up out of the granny poo. Major fail on the hardware that keeps falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Park Manager

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT MATERIAL !!!
customer_reviews.text: You can't squeeze the mop. It goes to the sides. All the water goes all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Enma L. Giron Lemuz

customer_reviews.title: Nice mop bucket
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and sturdy unit. This thing has been rock solid so far. Bucket is a good heavy material, solid wheel casters, and the mop press is sturdy and does not bow when heavy pressure is applied. It rolls smoothly and does exactly what it is supposed to do.. For the price mark, it beats out all the competition. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TJ McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like it as I'm mopping my basement and garage plus tile in house. It is rather heavy, I take it downstairs and bring it up in 2 pieces. I also would like a drain of some type on it. But the mop wringer works well, takes the water out. All in all a good product, rolls easily too.0
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just unpacked unit and assembled. First thing I noticed is how thick and sturdy the plastic is. Unit seems very well built. Granted, I have not used it yet. I will update after use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark6936

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A little sad that it has no mop holder hook but otherwise amazing
customer_reviews.author: Gretta W.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can wheel it around easily. I dont like when I put water into it bc I have to lift it out of the tub bc I suffer from chronic pain. I try to put just enough water to clean what I need, so I dont drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Sandra Manning

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice professional grade
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built sturdy bucket and wringer. Full size
customer_reviews.author: WinU

customer_reviews.title: Best mop bucket ever!
customer_reviews.text: These mop buckets compare and perform as well as others that cost much more. For lite industrial mopping tasks and everyday use, these mop buckets meet our demands. Will certainly purchase again and recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product For Large Homes With Heavy Traffic
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it is a well-made product. The only reason I gave 4 stars for durability and sturdiness is that I am a larger more powerful individual naturally and for myselfs, the plastic felt a bit flimsy. I could feel the give of the material when I would pull the handle and on a few occasions I Felt I needed to be mindful not to pull to hard or I would snap the plastic or whatever the material is, it has excellent recoil spring, cleans up well.
customer_reviews.author: Chee

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Basics is a great value
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality for a fraction of the name brands. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. The only thing I wish I had paid attention to was the clip thing that will hold the handle of your mop from falling loose in the bucket. This bucket has one but it’s detachable and not molded rt onto the wringer. Guess it’s not that big of a deal but makes me nervous about breaking someday.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Chandler

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this mop bucket
customer_reviews.text: So I know it's silly to get excited over a mop bucket but this mop bucket is just REALLY nice. It's easy to fill, easy to move around, easy to empty, very sturdily built, and the wringer is smooth as butter. It is the EXACT thing I wanted in a mop bucket. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Edwards

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: this is great for personal and home use. recently had a flood and this thing held up with zero issues. I dont think this has a durability issue as it feels very similar to the rubber maids I used to use at my warehouse job.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Sage

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a Rubbermaid unit that broke apart. This one is better in all respects; positive wringing action, steel components in stress points, removable wringer, high quality casters.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Policke

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I clean faster with this and don't need to stick my hands in chemicals like today with a open wound, it does get all the water out and it bends a bit but not enough to break, I did it to see if it would break so far a good product but if you break it on purpose then that's on you..
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a simple mop squeeze bucket, but this is HUGE! Not really for home use, but was cheapest. Had no idea how large it would be. Meant for commercial use for sure.
customer_reviews.author: I'm in love with JESUS!

customer_reviews.title: Commercial Grade Mop Bucket
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is large just like a professional or commercial competitors bucket. Very sturdy and works great. I have no fear or breaking or tearing this up.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S

customer_reviews.title: Nice bucket and wringer
customer_reviews.text: This helps get the job done. I find it to be lighter in weight than one of the other brands. Installation is easy, just push in the wheels and attach the wringer. So, it works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Pro quality, amateur price
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I use it, I pretend like I’m part of a cleaning crew at Nakitomi Plaza, just mopping and waiting until John McClane starts pulling shenanigans. Go ahead, shoot the glass. I’ll mop it up.
customer_reviews.author: Dingus Magee

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one I have had for 38 years! It works so good and maneuvers easily across floor, squeezes mop just nice!! Easy to clean after your done mopping too!
customer_reviews.author: VLW

customer_reviews.title: Good value, on par with rubbermaid.
customer_reviews.text: Own a restaurant that has vinyl tile floors throughout and a mop bucket is put through its paces with 1800 sqft of floor space. Mop bucket has smooth rolling casters and the wringer has a good sturdy handle and base to attach to bucket. I can see this lasting us just as long as our previous rubbermaid or longer. Good job Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cast

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and much better for handicapped people to use than trying to wring out with your foot. Sturdy and material is thick so should last a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Durable mop bucket
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, very durable. Used multiple times every day in food service.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Makes mopping a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Decided to upgrade to a mop bucket like this with our animals and children and all hard floors. Makes mopping an ease and was 25% cheaper than retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: K. ryan

customer_reviews.title: heavy and Truly unbalanced
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is really heavy and worst - if you have to lift it it tilts badly to one side. EVen after removal of the mop squeezer unit. This can easily cause spills.
customer_reviews.author: Saltman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy considering price to performance.
customer_reviews.text: Durable and maneuverable enough to last especially if you're just getting one for use around the house. Amazon definitely did right by this mop bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Jose O.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, just awesome.
customer_reviews.text: My god, it's like a dream come true. I've always wanted a "real" mop bucket and I finally have one. No more crappy ringers or "spin mops". A+
customer_reviews.author: Eric Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Go to House Warming Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest gift anyone can get as a gift with a new house. My floors are always spotless. I love it. I know I have bought at least 10 of these over the years.
customer_reviews.author: 3Pete9

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I use it regularly. Lightweight (not like others I've owned) while sturdy and really easy to move around. I hope to have it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Hermelinda Banuelos

customer_reviews.title: Love my yellow mop bucket. Always wanted one now I have one. :D
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this yellow mop bucket. I don’t really like to mop but w this mopping is easy, quick and simple. I fill it up by transferring water from a pitcher to the bucket in the kitchen. My husband will empty the bucket for me. To heavy for me. Would I buy it again???? YES
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Who gets excited over a mop bucket? Me...I hate putting my hands in mop water. With this there's no touching the mop or the water.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Solid and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: This bucket set is exactly what we needed. There is room for plenty of water and the wringer is very good and moves around our shop floor effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Mauel P. Cid

customer_reviews.title: My hands are dry!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and not too heavy. I love that my hands don’t get wet while mopping.
customer_reviews.author: D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and use. We bought it for our basement and garage after we did some drywalling and needed to mop up dust. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Do not biy this for any daily use. This bucket works as a bucket but is a horrible design. There is no mop hook to hold the mop, the bucket is shallow and wide with no wave breaks, which means the water can easily slosh out. Wish i had purchased a different model for a little extra money
customer_reviews.author: Soos621

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and rolls around effortlessly the wringer easily detatches and reattaches for easy dumping and cleaning. Hi shine finish rinses easily.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Could use improvements
customer_reviews.text: My biggest problem with this is the fact that the mop handle can't be held by anything while inside the bucket. It creates a safety hazard with the handle just poking out after it has already fallen to the side. "Clip on with the C-shaped clip". Yeah but we need that so the mop handle can be held on the inside not the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Barron

customer_reviews.title: Home use/garage not commercial
customer_reviews.text: Other's said it was flimsy and the mop squeezer was weak I dont know how hot there water is getting but im impressed with what i got. I say it was well worth the money for home use/garage i used a lil silicone to hold the wheels better it works no issues
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy commercial style mop bucket. better than anything we've seen at some of the local box stores. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AfishcalledA

customer_reviews.title: Soft wheels for noise reduction
customer_reviews.text: We liked the hard plastic that was made of, strong. It move around well, and it contains water well while moving the bucket, not splashing around.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for small chores
customer_reviews.text: It isn't the sturdiest when draining the water out of the mop but it gets the job done when cleaning light messes. I would suggest using a light mop too.
customer_reviews.author: Light

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love how the fact since I got this it dose not take me to long to mop now it fast and even easier
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and solid
customer_reviews.text: My last rubbermade bucket lasted over 20 years. This one is similar and I expect to get many good years from it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Very strong
customer_reviews.text: I tried another mop bucket but it was not strong but with amazonbasic mop bucket is heavy strong and very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Akshay

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning is easier
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me. No problem with assembly or the wringer. Love that I can roll and store in a corner in the garage. Has made cleaning and waxing our floors easier and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was just tired of the homeowner quality mop and bucket. I'm very happy I bought it
customer_reviews.author: BillyTheKid

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I read some reviews about it bending but I have not experienced this. Maybe they are superhumans.
customer_reviews.author: wade

customer_reviews.title: Super Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate this mop bucket, I needed a replacement, and this is perfect. It rolls so smooth, without any problems and is really easy to put together. I would recommend this bucket to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me...
customer_reviews.text: Large home with tile floors, a dog, a cat, and a husband. This setup works well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sedonartist

customer_reviews.title: Good for serious mopping jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Home cleaning use. Strong but expensive.Good for tough cleaning jobs.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is PERFECT! The material is VERY strong and sturdy. Top quality. Assembly is so easy it's practically criminal. I was looking for something that would last me and my two bedroom apartment a long time. I've found it. If you are looking for an amazing quality mop bucket, don't think twice. This is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Khestri Tarine Fox

customer_reviews.title: Well made, stable, and glides on concrete floor with no trouble.
customer_reviews.text: This is so well made, solid, balanced, and glides along with no effort. I am very impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and good quality item
customer_reviews.text: I like the item and the delivery arrived early then expected and I am happy that it did because I needed it
customer_reviews.author: Randy Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move and bright color safety mop combination.
customer_reviews.text: This mop combination is made of polypropylene, this material is more durable, and it also has four casters, which can be moved back and forth easily. The surface of these four casters is smooth, and it produces very little sound when moved. Its appearance is more color Bright and bright, it is easy to e seen in the office, avoiding the collision of personnel.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Anders Hægstad

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: My whole house is tiled and I hated having to bend over to wring out the mop, especially because I have a bad back. This is wonderful! I can wring it out standing up! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I always wanted one. To mop my kitchen with. Not overly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: megan mahon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and rolls smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy Wheels are great. I just use this for washing my truck, so I'm not sure exactly how the mop ringer works, but the whole system seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality by a great company. Easy to use and move. Smart investment as this will last you a very long time.

customer_reviews.title: Mop mop away!
customer_reviews.text: We got this because we have two dogs and mop often. Great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my work shop. Precious one I had was old and dirty and half broken . This is perfect for my shop. Sturdy product and price is right.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Nice commercial mop bucket. Heavy duty, professional grade. Works perfectly for me.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: If only it’s smaller in size than I’d like that’s available. Too bulky for the residential home but easier to squeeze water out of the mop

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured, this is VERY LARGE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a LARGE mop bucket, very durable, smooth gliding wheels and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: I like it

customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to mop the floor with but it seems like my dog really enjoys peeing on it so two for one

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really thick plastic, for the $37 I paid I thought it would be thin and cheaply made.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have purchased one of these sooner. Nice sturdy product.

customer_reviews.text: Writing random words because a five star rating is unacceptable

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for a mop bucket and wringer like this. This one was the best price I could find. When it arrived, I was surprised by its durability and high quality. I love my mop bucket and I would highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying it!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty but also lightweight! Easy to clean and roll around to wherever you need it

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value and great product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and use. Great price. Better than others on the market.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Utility Bucket and Mop!
customer_reviews.text: Use this Side Press Wringer Combo every day. It beats squeezing your mop by hand.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetWizKid

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Side Press Wringer Combo Commercial Mop Bucket on Wheels, 35 Quart, Yellow
feature_bullets: 35-quart mop bucket and side-press wringer combo for cleaning floors or mopping up messes; designed for commercial use
High-efficiency side-press wringer works with fan mop holders; down-press wringer works with fan and jaw mop holders; wringers quickly send water back down into bucket
Made of durable polypropylene; measurement marks (in 5-quart increments) run up the inside wall of the bucket
Loop carry handle; integrated pour handle; 4 smooth-rolling casters for quiet, convenient mobility; bright yellow color for easy visibility and added safety
Mop-handle clip-on holder keeps mop upright in bucket; mop not included; backed by an AmazonBasics limited one-year warranty

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
